content: this crochet shoulder bag pattern includes 4 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials 2mm macrame rope you can substitute 170 yards of #5 bulky weight yarn if you can t find macrame 2mm rope but it will have a different look and feel i used 2 skeins of 2mm macaroni macrame rope in color vison crochet hook size 6mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy gauge 9 st x 11 row = 4 measurements 21 77″ circumference x 10 18″ tall *not including the straps thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
